overview: Embark on a journey of pure sexual attraction as 5 sexy girls are captured in 5 scenes that set the standard for high definition erotica. Watch the chemistry set into motion as Emily Grey, Veronica Radke, Skylar Green, Chase Ryder, and Addison Avery use their sexual prowess to charm and lure you in. An explosive encounter is inevitable as you witness the passion of their pure sexual attraction!
title: Pure Sexual Attraction
